children.value: Buttons are an essential way to interact with and navigate through an app, and should clearly communicate what action will occur after the user taps them, like invoke an action to confirm
something. The Buttons can consist of text and/or icon/image, and can be enhanced with a variety of attributes. Here is a sample with some buttons using the Material Design style from Google
